component.summary: pycellsheet is a non-traditional spreadsheet application that is based on and written in the programming language Python

description.p: pycellsheet is a non-traditional spreadsheet application that is based on and written in the programming language Python. The goal of pycellsheet is to be the most pythonic spreadsheet.

pycellsheet expects Python expressions in its grid cells, which makes a spreadsheet specific language obsolete. Each cell returns a Python object that can be accessed from other cells. These objects can represent anything including lists or matrices.
pycellsheet is free software. It is released under the GPL v3 licence.
This is a bugfix release for pycellsheet 2.0 for Python 3.10 compatibility.
